General.Name: IKKA Holdings (Cayman) Limited
General.Description: IKKA Holdings (Cayman) Limited researches, manufactures, and develops plastic automotive parts and modules in Japan, China, Vietnam, Malaysia, and internationally. Its products include precision plastic injection molded parts for automobiles and electric vehicles, mold production, gears, business machine parts, residential related equipment parts, and others. The company was founded in 1963 and is based in George Town, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: PO Box 472, George Town, Cayman Islands, KY1-1106
